mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,a.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,a.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,a.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.yonghu_age as yonghuAge ,a.jiashu_name as jiashuName ,a.jiashu_phone as jiashuPhone ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM yonghu a
and a.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and a.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and a.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.yonghu_age >= #{params.yonghuAgeStart}
and a.yonghu_age <= #{params.yonghuAgeEnd}
and a.jiashu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiashuName},'%')
and a.jiashu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiashuPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
